verbs.description: [ARG1: The actors] [V: appeared] [ARGM-LOC: on a special edition in which Ivana Trump made a guest appearance dancing alongside ex - husband Rossano Rubicondi] .
The actors appeared on [ARGM-LOC: a special edition] [R-ARGM-LOC: in which] [ARG0: Ivana Trump] [V: made] [ARG1: a guest appearance] [ARGM-ADV: dancing alongside ex - husband Rossano Rubicondi] .
The actors appeared on a special edition in which [ARG0: Ivana Trump] made a guest appearance [V: dancing] [ARG1: alongside ex - husband Rossano Rubicondi] .
